vsParam:
To put it simply, your commission is...
to bring a Ghost here!

Bring a Ghost... here!?
What do you mean?

There is a legend of "Ghost Sky Ship" here.
A female pirate named Verbena used to rule the sea here!

She died before getting the treasure she wanted
so much that she became a Ghost out of the obsession,
so she keeps ruling the pirate ship.

Gosh...
Could a Ghost live on the ship...

Yeah, and Verbena is a unique beauty!
I'd really love to see her... But I've been too busy!

So, please take Verbena to my mansion here!
That's it!

Hehe, you're curious about that...
[px], you're romantic too... Hehe.

Anyway, I'll tell you the location where the ghost ship
shows up frequently. Verbena... Please take her here!
